function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and disease spread","Mitigation":"Public education and enforcement of social distancing measures","Technologies":"AI-based crowd monitoring, contact tracing apps","People":"Urban dwellers, public transportation users","Owner":"Local authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Traffic congestion and increased vehicle use","Impact":"Greater energy and resource depletion, air pollution","Mitigation":"Investment in public transportation, promotion of cycling and walking","Technologies":"Smart traffic management systems, electric vehicles","People":"Urban commuters, city residents","Owner":"Transport authorities, city planners"},{"Description":"Inefficient governance mechanism for CE-related initiatives","Impact":"Delay in implementation of sustainable transport strategies","Mitigation":"Establishment of clear governance frameworks, stakeholder collaboration","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparency, data analytics for decision-making","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, logistics companies","Owner":"Government agencies, industry associations"}]}
